IceBreaker:MagicFlame.NAME: Magical Flame
IceBreaker:MagicFlame.DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. im:Ranged. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle !M! *Spark into your draw pile.

IceBreaker:Spark.NAME: Spark
IceBreaker:Spark.DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. im:Ranged. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw one card. Exhaust.
IceBreaker:Spark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. im:Ranged. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw two cards. Exhaust.

IceBreaker:StaffStrike.NAME: Staff Strike
IceBreaker:StaffStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards.

IceBreaker:FrostWind.NAME: Frosty Wind
IceBreaker:FrostWind.DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. im:Ranged. im:Connect. NL Deal !D! damage, NL apply !M! Weak. NL im:Respond : Gain !B! Block.

IceBreaker:HeavySnow.NAME: Snowflakes
IceBreaker:HeavySnow.DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. im:Ranged. NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

IceBreaker:Flash.NAME: Flash
IceBreaker:Flash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! im:Chronostasis. NL If you have no [E] left, gain [E].
IceBreaker:Flash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! im:Chronostasis. NL If you have no [E] left, gain [E] [E].

IceBreaker:Thunder.NAME: Thunder
IceBreaker:Thunder.DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. im:Ranged. im:Connect. NL Deal !D! damage. NL When you im:Respond successfully, put this card into your hand if it is in your draw pile.

IceBreaker:AirCut.NAME: Air Cut
IceBreaker:AirCut.DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. im:Ranged. im:Connect. NL Deal !D! damage. NL im:Respond : draw 1 card.

IceBreaker:Light.NAME: Hikari
IceBreaker:Light.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Play ALL *Sparks in your draw pile to the target. NL Exhaust.
IceBreaker:Light.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Play ALL *Sparks in your draw pile to the target.

IceBreaker:EarthCollapse.NAME: Earth Collapse
IceBreaker:EarthCollapse.DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. im:Ranged. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL All enemies lose !M! Strength this turn.

IceBreaker:BloodyPath.NAME: Bloody Execute
IceBreaker:BloodyPath.DESCRIPTION: Retain. im:Magic. im:Ranged. NL Remove ALL of your powers. NL Deal !D! damage for each power removed.

IceBreaker:RedMoon.NAME: Bloody Moon
IceBreaker:RedMoon.DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. im:Ranged. im:Connect. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL im:Respond : Add !M! *Spark on-top of your draw pile.

IceBreaker:SoulTremor.NAME: Soul Tremor
IceBreaker:SoulTremor.DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. NL Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL im:Gap : ALL enemies lose !IM2! HP and maxHP.
IceBreaker:SoulTremor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. Retain. NL Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL im:Gap : ALL enemies lose !IM2! HP and maxHP.

IceBreaker:GhostGlim.NAME: Ghost Lantern
IceBreaker:GhostGlim.DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. im:Ranged. NL Enemy loses !M! HP. NL Shuffle !IM2! *Spark into your draw pile.

IceBreaker:SilverDoor.NAME: Silver Gate
IceBreaker:SilverDoor.DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. NL Gain !B! Block. NL This turn, you won't lose im:Resonance.
IceBreaker:SilverDoor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. NL Gain !B! Block. NL During the next two turns, you won't lose im:Resonance.

IceBreaker:Blizzard.NAME: 暴风雪
IceBreaker:Blizzard.DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL ALL enemies 失去 !M! 点 Strength. NL Exhaust. NL im:Gap : 再打出一次.

IceBreaker:WheelOfHeat.NAME: Flame Wheel
IceBreaker:WheelOfHeat.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a *Spark, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

IceBreaker:Electrospark.NAME: Chronoflame
IceBreaker:Electrospark.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain im:Chronostasis equal to *Spark you played this combat (Max: 12).

IceBreaker:SeaOfLanterns.NAME: Red and Silver
IceBreaker:SeaOfLanterns.DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. im:Connect. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle !M! *Spark into your draw pile. NL im:Respond : Shuffle an additional *Spark.
IceBreaker:SeaOfLanterns.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. im:Connect. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle !M! *Spark into your draw pile. NL im:Respond : Shuffle an additional *Spark+.

IceBreaker:ThunderBlasting.NAME: 闪电连锁
IceBreaker:ThunderBlasting.DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. im:Ranged. NL im:Gap : 给予 !M! 层 易伤. NL 移除目标的所有 易伤. NL 每移除一层, 造成一次 !D! 点伤害.

IceBreaker:Pyroblast.NAME: Fire Burst
IceBreaker:Pyroblast.DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. im:Ranged. NL Deal !M! times the number of *Spark you played this combat plus 4, damage to ALL enemies.

IceBreaker:Flarier.NAME: Flarier
IceBreaker:Flarier.DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. NL Add a *Spark into your hand. NL Whenever you play a *Spark this turn, gain !M! Block.
IceBreaker:Flarier.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. NL Add a *Spark+ into your hand. NL Whenever you play a *Spark this turn, gain !M! Block.

IceBreaker:IcyBurst.NAME: 冰爆
IceBreaker:IcyBurst.DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. NL 目标失去等同于 虚弱 层数+1的 Strength. NL 将等量 *Spark 加入抽牌堆. NL Exhaust.

IceBreaker:ManaAgitation.NAME: Mana Agitation
IceBreaker:ManaAgitation.DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. NL Draw !M! im:Magic cards then take damage equal to number of cards in your hand.

IceBreaker:Snap.NAME: Snap
IceBreaker:Snap.DESCRIPTION: Choose and play a im:Magic in your draw pile.

IceBreaker:HauntHell.NAME: Ghost Hell
IceBreaker:HauntHell.DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. im:Ranged. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies six times. NL Shuffle !M! *Sparks into your draw pile.

IceBreaker:FreezeKing.NAME: King Freezing!
IceBreaker:FreezeKing.DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. im:Ranged. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Choose up to !M! cards from discard pile to shuffle into your draw pile.

IceBreaker:Perception.NAME: Perception
IceBreaker:Perception.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Gain [E] for each Power you Scried. NL im:Gap : draw 1 card.

IceBreaker:FakeParley.NAME: Chronochime
IceBreaker:FakeParley.DESCRIPTION: im:Connect. NL gain !M! im:Chronostasis. NL Outside im:Gap : Next im:Magic card can be affected by im:Resonance. NL im:Gap : draw !M! cards.
IceBreaker:FakeParley.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: im:Connect 2. NL gain !M! im:Chronostasis. NL Outside im:Gap : Next two im:Magic cards can be affected by im:Resonance. NL im:Gap : draw !M! cards.

IceBreaker:Oracle.NAME: Oracle
IceBreaker:Oracle.DESCRIPTION: im:Connect. Gain !B! Block. NL Choose !M! card to Retain for a turn.
IceBreaker:Oracle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: im:Connect 2. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Choose !M! cards to Retain for a turn.

IceBreaker:OverloadEmulate.NAME: 过载演算
IceBreaker:OverloadEmulate.DESCRIPTION: 将你的 im:Resonance 层数翻倍. NL Exhaust.
IceBreaker:OverloadEmulate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 将你的 im:Resonance 层数翻三倍. NL Exhaust.

IceBreaker:EliminateDistractions.NAME: Eliminate Distractions
IceBreaker:EliminateDistractions.DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! cards from your draw pile and Exhaust them. Shuffle a *Dazed into your draw pile.

IceBreaker:MagicExtraction.NAME: Extract Mana
IceBreaker:MagicExtraction.DESCRIPTION: Remove up to !M! Weak on an enemy, gain equal [E]. NL Exhaust.
IceBreaker:MagicExtraction.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove up to !M! Weak on an enemy, gain equal [E].

IceBreaker:OtherPartyOfMissing.NAME: See You Otherside
IceBreaker:OtherPartyOfMissing.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you enter im:Chronogap or end your turn with this card in your hand, increase this card's Block by !M! this combat.

IceBreaker:Leap.NAME: Warp
IceBreaker:Leap.DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. im:Connect. NL Gain !B! Block. NL im:Respond : gain [E].

IceBreaker:GhostStar.NAME: Ghost Star
IceBreaker:GhostStar.DESCRIPTION: im:Connect. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Choose !M! card(s) from your discard pile and put it to the bottom of your draw pile.

IceBreaker:CascadeIceWall.NAME: Cascaded Icy Wall
IceBreaker:CascadeIceWall.DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. im:Connect. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Outside im:Gap: Copy this into your discard pile. NL im:Gap : Play and Exhaust ALL copies in combat.

IceBreaker:SnowWalk.NAME: Yuki no Sou
IceBreaker:SnowWalk.DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. im:Connect. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

IceBreaker:DeepColdSwamp.NAME: Karma
IceBreaker:DeepColdSwamp.DESCRIPTION: im:Connect. NL Gain !B! Block. NL im:Respond : gain !M! im:Chronostasis.
IceBreaker:DeepColdSwamp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: im:Connect 2. NL Gain !B! Block. NL im:Respond : gain !M! im:Chronostasis.

IceBreaker:TimeRing.NAME: Chronoring
IceBreaker:TimeRing.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! im:Chronostasis. NL Increase this card's im:Chronostasis by 1 this combat.

IceBreaker:TimeLetter.NAME: Chronomunicate
IceBreaker:TimeLetter.DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. im:Ranged. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Pay 3 im:Chronostasis, to deal !D! damage again. NL next turn, gain !M! im:Chronostasis.

IceBreaker:MaterialDecomposition.NAME: Decompose Material
IceBreaker:MaterialDecomposition.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! card. Gain !IM2! im:Resonance. NL Outside im:Gap: Exhaust.
IceBreaker:MaterialDecomposition.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! card. Gain !IM2! im:Resonance. NL Outside im:Gap: Exhaust.

IceBreaker:MaterialCreation.NAME: Create Material
IceBreaker:MaterialCreation.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random cards into your hand.

IceBreaker:TriggerLightning.NAME: Lighting Connecting
IceBreaker:TriggerLightning.DESCRIPTION: Innate. im:Connect. NL When this card is Upgraded, im:Connect 1. NL Can be Upgraded any number of times. NL Exhaust.

IceBreaker:HolyZone.NAME: Holy Zone
IceBreaker:HolyZone.DESCRIPTION: Stun ALL enemies whose HP is less than 50%. Exhaust.
IceBreaker:HolyZone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Stun ALL enemies whose HP is less than 50%. Exhaust.

IceBreaker:MemoriesFloodBack.NAME: Frosted Star Fantasy
IceBreaker:MemoriesFloodBack.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL Gain a copy of your opening hand. NL im:Unnate. Exhaust.
IceBreaker:MemoriesFloodBack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exhaust your hand. NL Gain a copy of your opening hand. NL im:Unnate. Exhaust.

IceBreaker:Overgrow.NAME: Tuft
IceBreaker:Overgrow.DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. im:Ranged. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL At the start of your next turn, add a copy with Exhaust into your hand.

IceBreaker:Negate.NAME: Deny
IceBreaker:Negate.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you im:Respond unsuccessfully, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

IceBreaker:TimeShadow.NAME: Chronoshadow
IceBreaker:TimeShadow.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! im:Chronostasis. NL Scry !M!. NL Draw 1 card.

IceBreaker:TimeLeap.NAME: Chronoleap
IceBreaker:TimeLeap.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! im:Chronostasis.

IceBreaker:SpaceOfChaos.NAME: Chaospace
IceBreaker:SpaceOfChaos.DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. NL Gain !M! Buffer. NL im:Gap : Gain an additional Buffer. NL Exhaust.

IceBreaker:StarDust.NAME: Star Dust
IceBreaker:StarDust.DESCRIPTION: The first !M! time(s) you im:Respond successfully each turn, gain [E].

IceBreaker:DiffuseFuture.NAME: Diffuse Future
IceBreaker:DiffuseFuture.DESCRIPTION: Outside im:Gap : enter im:Chronogap. NL im:Gap : end your turn, gain an extra turn and enter im:Gap. NL Exhaust.

IceBreaker:InfinityFortress.NAME: Infinity Fortress
IceBreaker:InfinityFortress.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! times X Metallicize. NL Exhaust.

IceBreaker:Niflheimr.NAME: Niflheimr
IceBreaker:Niflheimr.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, ALL enemies lose !M! Strength.
IceBreaker:Niflheimr.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn or whenever you enter im:Chronogap, ALL enemies lose !M! Strength.

IceBreaker:DemonDeLaplace.NAME: Demon De Laplace
IceBreaker:DemonDeLaplace.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever you play a card created in combat, gain !M! im:Resonance.
IceBreaker:DemonDeLaplace.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card created in combat, gain !M! im:Resonance.

IceBreaker:DeepCalculate.NAME: Deep Calculate
IceBreaker:DeepCalculate.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a im:Connect card, additionally trigger its im:Respond.

IceBreaker:Chronover.NAME: Chronover
IceBreaker:Chronover.DESCRIPTION: Exchange your draw pile and discard pile, gain !M! im:Chronostasis.
IceBreaker:Chronover.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exchange your draw pile and discard pile, gain !M! im:Chronostasis and !M! im:Resonance.

IceBreaker:ExtraTrigger.NAME: Extra Trigger
IceBreaker:ExtraTrigger.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! cards. NL At the start of your next turn, add copies of them into your hand, they cost 0 that turn.

IceBreaker:Detonate.NAME: Detonate
IceBreaker:Detonate.DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. NL At the start of your next turn, deal !M! X damage to ALL enemies.

IceBreaker:IceDebrisSplashed.NAME: Icy Burst
IceBreaker:IceDebrisSplashed.DESCRIPTION: im:Magic. im:Ranged. NL Deal damage equal to im:Chronostasis !M! times. NL im:Gap : Lock its damage to twelve.

IceBreaker:CTL.NAME: Catch the Light
IceBreaker:CTL.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you im:Respond successfully, draw 1 card.

IceBreaker:OnChronosBehalf.NAME: On Chrono's Behalf!
IceBreaker:OnChronosBehalf.DESCRIPTION: im:Ranged. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If Fatal, im:Connect.

IceBreaker:GhostFantasy.NAME: Ghost Fantasy
IceBreaker:GhostFantasy.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played as the last card in your hand. NL Choose 1 of 3 random cards to add into your hand, repeat !M! times.
IceBreaker:GhostFantasy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Can only be played as the last card in your hand. NL Choose 1 of 3 random Upgraded cards to add into your hand, repeat !M! times. NL They cost 0 this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Card in my hand must no more than 1!

IceBreaker:AllInAsh.NAME: All In Ash
IceBreaker:AllInAsh.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL Add an *Ember into your hand. NL Exhaust.
IceBreaker:AllInAsh.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL Add an *Ember+ into your hand. NL Exhaust.

IceBreaker:Embers.NAME: Ember
IceBreaker:Embers.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add X *Spark into your hand. NL Gain X [E]. NL Exhaust.
IceBreaker:Embers.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add X+1 *Spark into your hand. NL Gain X+1 [E]. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add !M! *Spark into your hand. NL Gain !M! [E]. NL Exhaust.

IceBreaker:Inspire.NAME: Inspire
IceBreaker:Inspire.DESCRIPTION: im:Connect. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Your next im:Magic card costs 0. NL im:Gap :Your next im:Magic card is played twice.

IceBreaker:MagicalFlood.NAME: Magical Surge
IceBreaker:MagicalFlood.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you enter im:Chronogap, draw !M! cards.

IceBreaker:SeeYouTomorrow.NAME: Asahi
IceBreaker:SeeYouTomorrow.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you im:Respond successfully, gain !M! Block.

IceBreaker:NightOfFireworks.NAME: Hanabi
IceBreaker:NightOfFireworks.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn or when you enter im:Chronogap, shuffle !M! *Spark into your draw pile.
IceBreaker:NightOfFireworks.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn or when you enter im:Chronogap, shuffle !M! *Spark+ into your draw pile.

IceBreaker:VitalLoop.NAME: Vital Loop
IceBreaker:VitalLoop.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn you may put !M! card from your discard pile ontop of the draw pile.
IceBreaker:VitalLoop.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn you may put !M! card from your discard pile ontop of the draw pile.

IceBreaker:FantasyDream.NAME: Fantasy Dream
IceBreaker:FantasyDream.DESCRIPTION: When you play a card which does not Exhaust or is a Power, Exhaust it and im:Trigger once more.

IceBreaker:HarshTemperament.NAME: Harsh
IceBreaker:HarshTemperament.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you enter im:Chronogap, your next im:Magic card with non 0 cost will played twice.

IceBreaker:AsterismForm.NAME: Asterism Form
IceBreaker:AsterismForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn or when you enter im:Chronogap, choose 1 of 15 random cards from ALL colors to play. NL Every card can be selected once per run.
IceBreaker:AsterismForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn or when you enter im:Chronogap, choose 1 of 15 random Upgraded cards from ALL colors to play. NL Every card can be selected once per run.

IceBreaker:YesterdayOnceMore.NAME: Yesterday Once More
IceBreaker:YesterdayOnceMore.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you im:Respond successfully, gain !M! im:Chronostasis.
IceBreaker:YesterdayOnceMore.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a im:Connect card, gain !M! im:Chronostasis.

IceBreaker:RainbowViolet.NAME: Rainbow Violet
IceBreaker:RainbowViolet.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP and maxHP, borrow power from a dead friend. NL Remove from your deck after you play it 7 times. NL Exhaust.
IceBreaker:RainbowViolet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Lose !M! HP and maxHP, borrow power from a dead friend. NL Remove from your deck after you play it 7 times. NL Exhaust.

IceBreaker:TsukishiRin.NAME: Tsukishi Rin
IceBreaker:TsukishiRin.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack on an enemy, target lose 1 Strength.

IceBreaker:Shiroikumo.NAME: Shiroi Kumo
IceBreaker:Shiroikumo.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, draw 1 card.

IceBreaker:Fukuhi.NAME: Fukuhi
IceBreaker:Fukuhi.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, remove all of your debuffs and heal 8 HP.

IceBreaker:Ame.NAME: Ame
IceBreaker:Ame.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you enter im:Chronogap, gain 8 Metallicize.

IceBreaker:Disobey.NAME: Disobey
IceBreaker:Disobey.DESCRIPTION: im:Connect can succeed when the im:Connect target is in the discard pile.

IceBreaker:TsukishiRitsu.NAME: Tsukishi Ritsu
IceBreaker:TsukishiRitsu.DESCRIPTION: Enter im:Chronogap. NL At the start of your turn, enter im:Chronogap.
